attributes.action: Commemorating the 40th anniversary of the 1984 Sikh massacres
attributes.additional_details: These horrific events have been described by many as genocide, including by the Delhi High Court and reportedly by members of the Indian government, including the Indian Prime Minister. India’s Central Bureau of Investigation (CBI) said that the murders fall under the category of crimes against humanity on parity with genocides worldwide.
attributes.background: This petition is calling on the UK government to commemorate the 40th anniversary of the 1984 Sikh massacres.
